headline: Entergy (ETR) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Drew Marsh: Thank you, Liz, and good morning, everyone.  Haley Fisackerly, our CEO at Entergy Mississippi, recently noted that customer rates would be 16% lower than they otherwise would have been due to these large customers.

headline: Entergy (ETR) Beats Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: Entergy (ETR) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +4.79% and +8.64%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Entergy: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The New Orleans-based company said it had net income of $1.53 per share. The results topped Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of five analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.46 per share.
